DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Diagnostic procedure , 3'-deoxy-3'- [ 18F ] fluorothymidine ( FLT ) PET image , may help find diagnose cancer . It may also help doctor predict patient 's response treatment help plan best treatment . PURPOSE : This phase I trial study FLT PET image patient cancer .
DOC.brief_title: 3'-Deoxy-3'-18F Fluorothymidine PET Imaging Patients With Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Evaluate use 3'-deoxy-3'- [ 18F ] fluorothymidine ( FLT ) positron emission tomography ( PET ) image measure tumor proliferation DNA synthetic pathway ( thymidine kinase level ) patient cancer . Secondary - Determine efficacy FLT PET image detect lesion estimate response treatment . OUTLINE : Patients undergo four 3'-deoxy-3'- [ 18F ] fluorothymidine positron emission tomography imaging procedure .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets one follow criterion : Histologically confirm solid tumor hematologic malignancy Awaiting biopsy surgery cancer evaluation mass detect exam standard image PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Able lie still PET scanner Girth weight must suitable enter gantry Not pregnant nursing Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
